content.rendered:
Dr. Arvin Tounian
D.D.S.

Dr. Arvin Tounian DDS

Dr. Tounian’s craft is creating healthy, natural, beautiful smiles. His passion is knowing the patients he treats. Dr. Tounian and his team’s mission is to fully understand each patient’s concern individually and to treat them all with the highest level of care.

Every person who steps through the door has different needs and we aim to understand and fulfill those needs with quality care and personal service.

When Dr. Tounian is not at work, he spends his time with his wife Angelina, his daughter Melina, and his dog Bran. Cooking, traveling, books and video games are his favorite hobbies.

Education

  • Pre-Dental Program, University of the Pacific in Stockton - Graduated at the top of his class
  • Dental School at the University of the Pacific School of Dentistry in San Francisco
